info.name: Minimal SCP Foundation Based on Cocoonist
info.description: The original style has been abandoned by the author. I managed to optimize it and fix several bugs on Chinese website.
info.additionalInfo:
Original Code (Project abandoned): https://userstyles.org/styles/137508/minimal-scp-foundation-by-cocoonist

Bug-fix and color optimization included.

Permission granted from the original author.
